input.sentences: the guy had buckets of food
output.sentences: In college, Mary knew a guy named Greg who always ate his food from buckets.
Even now when she is older, and a mom, she still finds it funny.
Her son Jason, and his girlfriend Mandy knew she was telling the story again, and couldn't stop smiling.
Later while with friends he started thinking about this after a few drinks, and can't stop laughing.
It got even worse when he ran into Greg daughter who was laying out working on her tan.
